text:
Naglis Puteikis (born 2 September 1964) is a Lithuanian politician and archaeologist. He is a member of the Seimas.
Biography.
Puteikis was born on 2 September 1964 in Vilnius. He is married with Nina and has son Gediminas and daughter Auguste.
In 1982 he finished Vilnius 15th high school. In 1983 he join to army and went to Afghanistan.
